Package ch.grengine

Grengine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UpdateExceptionNotifier
    Interface for notifying about successful or failed Grengine updates.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseGrengine
    Abstract base Grengine.
    Grengine
    Grengine.
    Grengine.Builder
    Builder for instances of Grengine.
    Grengine.Grape
    Convenience class for easily getting a Grengine that works with Grape, eliminating also a Groovy issue related to Grape (GROOVY-7407).
